INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Bottle(
) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d'), IFNULL(input_count,0),IFNULL(charge_count,0),IFNULL(sales_count,0),IFNULL(rental_count,0),IFNULL(back_count,0),IFNULL(discard_count,0),'admin',now() from ( SELECT count(Bottle_BarCd) input_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0388' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) a, ( SELECT count(Bottle_BarCd) charge_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0305' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) b, ( SELECT count(Bottle_BarCd) sales_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0308' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d')) c, ( SELECT count(Bottle_BarCd) rental_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0309' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) d, ( SELECT count(Bottle_BarCd) back_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd in ('0310', '0311','0312') AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) e, ( SELECT count(Bottle_BarCd) discard_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0399' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) f

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Bottle(
) SELECT LEFT(Stat_Dt,7), SUM(Bottle_Input_Count) , SUM(Bottle_Charge_Count) , SUM(Bottle_Sales_Count) , SUM(Bottle_Rental_Count) , SUM(Bottle_Back_Count) , SUM(Bottle_Discard_Count) , 'admin' , NOW() FROM TB_Daily_Stat_Bottle WHERE LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m') GROUP BY LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)
